title: Xiaohan Liu
text:
I am a first-year Biostatistics PhD student at the University of Pennsylvania broadly interested in topics under causal inference and selective inference.
Before joining the PhD program, I obtained my BS in Statistics and Data Science from Carnegie Mellon University.
For chats about research ideas, potential collaborations, music, or books, feel free to reach out at liuxh[at]upenn[dot]edu!


Research Interests

Causal inference from observational data
Hypothesis testing under distributional shifts
Selective inference



Education

PhD in Biostatistics
The University of Pennsylvania, TBD
BS in Statistics and Data Science (Mathematical Sciences Track)
Carnegie Mellon University, May 2024

title: Music
text:
I played flute in my middle school band, high school marching band, wind ensemble, full orchestra, TMEA Region Band, Orchestra, and All-State Band.
At CMU, I was lucky to continue playing as part of the All-University Orchestra.
Besides orchestral music, I enjoy listening to piano and Studio Ghibli soundtracks.
